title: S1 Ep6: The Real Life Ghost Whisperer
itunes:title: The Real Life Ghost Whisperer
description: Mary Ann Winkowski has an unusual gift... she can talk to earthbound spirits, and only earthbound spirits!  She has used this gift to guide many lost souls to their reward in the afterlife and they made a TV show about her, The Ghost Whisperer!  Mary Ann joins Darkness Radio to talk about her life and talk about what it is like to be trapped on this earth when you die!!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
